domain.api

Interface NotificationInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UserInterface

    public interface NotificationInterface
    Interface used to display notifications to the user.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void display(java.lang.String info)
      Notify any information of interest related to the simulation to the UserInterface by the schedulers.

    • Method Detail

      • display

        void display(java.lang.String info)
        Notify any information of interest related to the simulation to the UserInterface by the schedulers.
        Parameters:
        info - - Information to be notified.
